description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Ralph Capurso
**판결일**: 1939-04-17
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 256 A.D. 1097

## 판결문 요약


Judgment of the Court of Special Sessions of the City of New York, Borough of Brooklyn [County of Kings], convicting defendant of the crime of assault in the third degree and sentencing him to three months in the workhouse unanimously affirmed. No opinion. Present — Lazansky, P. J., Hagarty, Carswell, Johnston and Adel, JJ.
...
